item.title: Adding Hidden Owner Rank [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:13, topic:518733”][quote author=Arcik link=topic=636996.msg4311306#msg4311306 date=1370782611]

create something like jagex’s viewing orb for fight pits: player camera object >> actual client camera packets >> draw it per given player >> watch what they’re doing

orb of oculus
[/quote]that’s for viewing around yourself, but generally it’s the same concept.[/quote]
Its actually fairly easy once you get to know the camera packet.

item.title: Adding Hidden Owner Rank [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

what is the purpose of censoring ownership? in most cases, you blow your own cover by ‘trusting friends’ and someone slipping out by calling you on a first name basis, or you slip up yourself and talk about some type of ‘power’ etc etc.

if you wish to monitor your user base, develop better systems/applications to do so.

create something like jagex’s viewing orb for fight pits: player camera object >> actual client camera packets >> draw it per given player >> watch what they’re doing

Read full topic

epic fail O_o’

if you play on a different computer than the hosting one, make it a dynamic ip address and play with that O_O’ ffs people this is not that complicated of an issue. His way works, so do these.

item.title: Adding Hidden Owner Rank [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Sup22211, post:5, topic:518733”][quote author=Arcik link=topic=636996.msg4294779#msg4294779 date=1368030861]

[/quote]
That wont be “hidden” owner[/quote]I think what he was getting at was that

3 = general owner
4 = normally “hidden”

so anything above a moderator will have these specific powers. That way you don’t have to write code more than once.

item.title: Adding Hidden Owner Rank [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @usmanm786 usmanm786
item.description:
@usmanm786 wrote:

Hi, You are adding a feature that will allow you to do owner commands without having a crown (Hidden Owner).

Step 1 : Open commands.java

Step 2 : Search for something similar to this :

if (c.playerRights >= 0) playerCommands(c, playerCommand); if (c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3) moderatorCommands(c, playerCommand); if (c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3) administratorCommands(c, playerCommand); if (c.playerRights == 3) ownerCommands(c, playerCommand); if (c.playerRights >= 1) DonatorCommands(c, playerCommand);

Step 3 : At the end of all the lines add " || c.isHiddenOwner())". For example

if (c.playerRights == 3) ownerCommands(c, playerCommand);

Would turn into

if (c.playerRights == 3 || c.isHiddenOwner()) ownerCommands(c, playerCommand);

Step 4 : Save and Open Player.java

Step 5 : Search for “public abstract class Player {”

Step 6 : Under it add

public boolean isHiddenOwner(){ return playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR_HIDDEN_OWNER_ACCOUNT_NAME"); }

Step 7 : Replace “YOUR_HIDDEN_OWNER_ACCOUNT_NAME” With the name of the account you want to be hidden owner.

Step 8 : Save player.java. Compile and your done.

Now the player name you used will have all commands that you have.

Read full topic
